events.name: Non-fungible Token Developers Meetup
events.description: This is a collaboration between The Hungry Lab, Singapore Blockchain & Dapps and AlphaWallet. We will be introducing the potential use cases for NFTs and ERC 875 for blockchain developers and cover the following topics: 1. NFTs and ERC875What is NFTs? differences between FTs? What are the potential use caseWhat is ERC875? What are the advanced protocols inside ERC875?2. The first use case with ERC875Shankai’s 2018 FIFA WORLD CUP Blockchain Tickets Experiment3. AlphaWalletWhat is AlphaWallet? What we are doing and why? Usability, Scalability and Privacy4. New protocols (ERCs) from usAttestation, Check protocols, random number, Secret sharing protocol and etc. If have more time:5. Brain storm, NFTs use case6. Create your own NFTs Main Speaker Victor Zhang3 years experience in blockchain, over 10 years business experience with 7 years experience managing multinational teams and businesses across Asia countries(Australia, Singapore, China, Hong Kong, Korea, Japan, India).Successfully opened up APAC business for 360experience from zero, 360experience is one of the 3 business units under Ticketbis which was acquired by eBay @US$165 million in 2016. Serial entrepreneur，started 5 businesses in Australia, China, HK and Singapore. Started researching blockchain since 2014 and attempted to use blockchain technology to restructure the event ticketing industry. BTC and ETH investor. Wing Chun and boxing beginner.
events.location: The Carrot Patch, Apex@Henderson #02-09 201 Henderson Rd, Singapore
